text: wadhkr 'iidh qal allah taealaa yawm alqyamt: ya eisaa abn maryam 'a'ant qult lilnaas ajelwny wa'umiy mebwdyn min dun allh? fajab eisaa -mnzzihana allah teala-: ma yanbaghi li 'an 'aqul lilnaas ghyr alhq. 'iin knt qlt hdha faqad elmtah; li'anah la yakhfaa ealayk shy', taelam ma tdmrh nfsy, wala 'aelam ana ma fi nfsk. 'iinak 'ant ealm bikuli shay' mimaa zahar 'aw khfy
